Apple's iPhone 16 series is currently available at discounted prices on Flipkart, along with additional bank offers during the Monumental Sale period.

  • iPhone 16 (128GB) discounted to Rs 69,999 (launch price Rs 79,900) with bank discounts up to Rs 1,500.
  • iPhone 16 Plus (128GB) discounted to Rs 79,999 (launch price Rs 89,900) with up to Rs 2,000 off.

title: MC Exclusive: Apple finally breaks into India’s top 5 smartphone brands with record market share - Moneycontrol
summary:
Apple Breaks into India's Top 5 Smartphone Brands with Record Market Share

Date: January 16, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

The unstoppable ascent of Apple in India reaches a new milestone! Apple has secured its place among the country's top five smartphone brands for the first time since it started selling iPhones in India, achieving a remarkable 9–10% market share during the festive September–December quarter of 2024.

  • Apple's market share reached 9–10%, marking a historic achievement.
  • This growth was supported by festive discounts and affordability offers, such as 24-month no-cost EMIs.
  • Older-generation models, including the iPhone 15 and iPhone 13, contributed significantly to this success.
“Apple set a record by entering the top five vendor list for the Indian smartphone market in Q4 2024 with a market share exceeding 9%,” said Upasana Joshi, Research Director at IDC.

In conclusion, Apple's rise in India highlights the effectiveness of its pricing strategies and product offerings, enabling it to achieve unprecedented popularity in a competitive market.
newTitle: Apple Breaks into India's Top 5 Smartphone Brands with Record Market Share

summary:
Realme 14 Pro series launching on Jan 16: Where to watch, what to expect

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Not specified

The Chinese smartphone brand Realme is set to launch its 14 Pro series 5G smartphones in India on January 16, featuring innovative designs and powerful specifications.

Key Points:

  • The launch event starts at 12 PM IST on January 16 and can be viewed on Realme India's YouTube channel.
  • The series includes Realme 14 Pro 5G and Realme 14 Pro Plus 5G smartphones powered by Snapdragon 7s Gen 3.
  • Introducing a unique temperature-responsive design created with Valeur Designers from Denmark.
  • Color options include Bikaner Purple and Jaipur Pink.
  • The Pro Plus model will feature a triple-reflection periscope camera system with a 50MP sensor.
  • New AI-driven imaging features like AI Ultra Clarity mode and AI Snap Mode will enhance photography.

summary:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Leaks Reveal New AI Features

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: Android Police

Samsung’s Galaxy S25 series is set to be officially announced on January 22, 2025, with new AI features that promise to enhance the user experience significantly.

  • The new features, named Now Brief, are designed to offer contextual tips and shortcuts based on user interactions.
  • They are expected to integrate seamlessly with other apps on the device, making tasks more efficient.
  • New examples include summarizing video content and creating notes from video mentions, potentially revolutionizing how users manage information.
  • The features will debut alongside the Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra models.
  • Samsung aims to compete directly with Apple’s AI offerings through these innovations.
"Now Brief... provides contextual information at a glance based on the time of day." - Android Police

This new focus on AI illustrates Samsung's commitment to not just hardware advancements but software intelligence that anticipates user needs.

title: Nintendo Switch 2 live updates — announcement expected tomorrow - Tom's Guide
Nintendo’s Next Machine Must Switch Past Patterns | Mint - Mint
summary:
Nintendo’s Next Machine Must Switch Past Patterns

Publication Date: 2025
Source: Bloomberg Opinion

Nintendo has acknowledged the necessity to innovate as it prepares for the successor to its best-selling console, the Switch. The company plans to announce details by March 2025, amidst concerns from investors about its history of inconsistent follow-ups.

  • Nintendo's Switch, set to be succeeded, has been a record-breaking success.
  • The upcoming announcement will provide insight into the new console's specifications and branding.
  • The company must avoid the pitfalls of its past, such as the poorly received Wii U.
  • It has been four years since the last console's launch, placing pressure on development cycles.
  • Nintendo relies heavily on its own game titles, which represent over 80% of software sold on the Switch.
  • The decision-making around the new console will significantly impact Nintendo's future trajectory.
“Whatever the shape of Nintendo’s next machine, the company typically doesn’t take the easy route.”

The company must find the right path in order to replicate the success of the Switch, an exceptional product in an otherwise challenging landscape for console manufacturers.
newTitle: Nintendo’s Next Machine Must Switch Past Patterns

summary:
Galaxy S25 ‘Slim’ is probably thicker than ‘iPhone 17 Air’ as leak reveals 6.4mm design

Publication Date: January 2025   Source: 9to5Google

Samsung and Apple are preparing to launch new, thinner smartphones in 2025. A leak reveals that Samsung's Galaxy S25 ‘Slim’ may not be as thin as Apple’s rumored ‘iPhone 17 Air’.

  • The Galaxy S25 'Slim' is rumored to be 159 x 76 x 6.4mm, which is approximately 2mm thinner than the Galaxy S25 Ultra.
  • The camera bump for the Galaxy S25 Slim is expected to be 8.3mm.
  • Reports suggest the iPhone 17 Air could be as thin as 5.5mm at its thinnest point.
  • Samsung has opened reservations for the Galaxy S25 series with pre-order incentives.
“Samsung has reservations open now for the Galaxy S25 series, with a $50 credit when you pre-order and up to $1,200+ in savings.”

The competition between Samsung and Apple for smartphone design is heating up as both companies aim to release their respective thin models, with implications for their market positions in 2025.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S25 'Slim' Design Leak Compared to iPhone 17 Air

title: 9 Films Rejected By Shah Rukh Khan That Became Blockbusters - India.com
summary:
9 Films Rejected By Shah Rukh Khan That Became Blockbusters

Published Date: Unknown
Source: india.com

Here’s a list of 9 films which were rejected by Shah Rukh Khan and they went on to become blockbuster hits.

  • Jodhaa Akbar: Shah Rukh Khan turned down the role of Akbar, later played by Hrithik Roshan.
  • Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai: Initially offered to SRK, he turned it down, leading to Hrithik Roshan’s debut success.
  • Rang De Basanti: Offered the role of Ajay Rathod but declined due to scheduling conflicts.
  • 3 Idiots: SRK had to decline the iconic role of Rancho due to injury; Aamir Khan stepped in.
  • Munna Bhai MBBS: SRK couldn’t take the role due to spine surgery, later played by Sanjay Dutt.
  • Slumdog Millionaire: Turned down the role of Prem Kumar due to scheduling conflicts.
  • Ek Tha Tiger: Declined the lead role due to creative differences; Salman Khan played it instead.
  • Jolly LLB 3: Offered a role but declined due to differences in creative direction.
“Many films were offered to Shah Rukh Khan, which could have become significant hits in his filmography.”

This illustrates the unpredictable nature of the film industry and how choices can lead to unexpected successes.
newTitle: 9 Films Rejected By Shah Rukh Khan That Became Blockbusters

The Republic Day Sale events on major e-commerce platforms like Flipkart and Amazon have led to significant discounts on the Samsung Galaxy S24, making it a great time for smartphone buyers.

  • The Samsung Galaxy S24 5G was launched at approximately Rs 80,000 but is now available for much less.

Five CES 2025 products I'd buy as soon as they'd take my money - ZDNet
summary:
Five CES 2025 products I'd buy as soon as they'd take my money

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: ZDNET

At CES 2025, several exciting new products were showcased, but five stood out to the author. Here’s a rundown of the top picks that are not just flashy concepts but practical items ready for purchase.

  • Mcon MagSafe Phone Controller: A gaming controller that attaches to a phone magnetically, with pre-orders available on Kickstarter.
  • Narwal Flow Robot Vacuum: Features Deep Carpet Boost technology for better cleaning performance, priced at $1,600.
  • Kirin Electric Salt Spoon: Enhances food flavor using mild electric currents, making it ideal for low-sodium diets.
  • LG Indoor Gardening Appliance: A smart lamp that supports plant growth with adjustable LED lights and a water reservoir.
  • ShiftCam Planck SSD: A USB-C SSD for mobile devices that supports high-speed video recording, available for pre-order.
"Take my money!" - Reviewer expressing excitement over CES products.

These products represent not only innovation but also practical applications for everyday life. Keep an eye out for them if you're looking to upgrade your tech this year.
newTitle: Top 5 Products from CES 2025 Worth Buying

title: Homegrown AI startup strengthens partnership with US tech giant Microsoft! What it aims to do - ET Now
summary:
Homegrown AI startup strengthens partnership with US tech giant Microsoft! What it aims to do

Updated Jan 15, 2025 | Source: ET Now News

A homegrown AI startup has further boosted its partnership with US tech major Microsoft to empower businesses with advanced customer engagement capabilities. Bengaluru-based Exotel, a leading provider of AI transformation for customer engagement and experience, is reshaping the communication landscape for enterprises with Microsoft.

  • Exotel aims to enhance businesses’ customer engagement capabilities aligned with their vision of scalable, cost-efficient communication solutions.
  • Exotel leverages Microsoft Azure Marketplace for AI-powered communication solutions like Intelligent Virtual Assistants and Enterprise Contact Center.
  • The partnership integrates data silos, unifying information sources for better customer conversational profiles across channels.
“Exotel's expertise in AI-powered customer engagement and experience solutions enables businesses to enhance their customer interactions while minimising operational complexities,” said a Microsoft spokesperson.

By strengthening their longstanding partnership, Exotel aims to deliver innovative solutions to enhance customer engagement and streamline communication for businesses.
newTitle: Homegrown AI startup strengthens partnership with US tech giant Microsoft
